languages.text: {n}Безволосый череп, более не прикрытый разбитыми рабочими окулярами, бугрится массивными наростами. Впрочем, мутантную сущность вашего врага выдает и куда более жуткий признак — третья рука, вырастающая прямо из торса. Пальцы ее ловко вытряхивают барабан стаб-револьвера и снаряжают его новыми патронами.{/n}

{n}No longer covered by the broken goggles, the hairless skull is bulging with massive growths. However, the mutant nature of your enemy is just as quickly betrayed by an even more unsettling feature: the third arm growing out of his torso. You watch as its fingers deftly empty the drum of a stub revolver and load it with fresh rounds.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Безволосый череп, более не прикрытый разбитыми рабочими окулярами, бугрится массивными наростами. Впрочем, мутантную сущность вашего врага выдает и куда более жуткий признак — третья рука, вырастающая прямо из торса. Пальцы ее ловко вытряхивают барабан стаб-револьвера и снаряжают его новыми патронами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No longer covered by broken eyepieces, the hairless skull is bulging with massive growths. However, the mutant nature of your enemy is betrayed by a much creepier feature, a third arm growing out of his torso. Its fingers deftly empty the drum of a stub revolver and load it with new ammo.{/n}

{n}No longer covered by broken eyepieces, the hairless skull is bulging with massive growths. However, the mutant nature of your enemy is betrayed by a much creepier feature, a third arm growing out of his torso. Its fingers deftly empty the drum of a stub revolver and load it with new ammo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der haarlose Schädel ist nicht mehr von der beschädigten Brille verdeckt und weist massive Auswüchse auf. Dass dein Feind ein Mutant ist, geht ebenso schnell aus einem noch beunruhigenderen Merkmal hervor: Aus seinem Torso ragt ein dritter Arm. Du siehst, wie dessen Finger geschickt die Trommel eines Stummelrevolvers leeren und mit neuer Munition nachladen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No longer covered by the broken goggles, the hairless skull is bulging with massive growths. However, the mutant nature of your enemy is just as quickly betrayed by an even more unsettling feature: the third arm growing out of his torso. You watch as its fingers deftly empty the drum of a stub revolver and load it with fresh rounds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der haarlose Schädel ist nicht mehr von der beschädigten Brille verdeckt und weist massive Auswüchse auf. Dass dein Feind ein Mutant ist, geht ebenso schnell aus einem noch beunruhigenderen Merkmal hervor: Aus seinem Torso ragt ein dritter Arm. Du siehst, wie dessen Finger geschickt die Trommel eines Stummelrevolvers leeren und mit neuer Munition nachladen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sin la cobertura de las gafas rotas, puedes ver que su cráneo calvo está abultado con unos tumores inmensos. Sin embargo, la naturaleza mutante de tu enemigo se hace evidente con algo aún más atroz: el tercer brazo que nace en su torso. Observas la destreza con la que vacía el cargador de un revólver compacto y lo recarga.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No longer covered by the broken goggles, the hairless skull is bulging with massive growths. However, the mutant nature of your enemy is just as quickly betrayed by an even more unsettling feature: the third arm growing out of his torso. You watch as its fingers deftly empty the drum of a stub revolver and load it with fresh rounds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sin la cobertura de las gafas rotas, puedes ver que su cráneo calvo está abultado con unos tumores inmensos. Sin embargo, la naturaleza mutante de tu enemigo se hace evidente con algo aún más atroz: el tercer brazo que nace en su torso. Observas la destreza con la que vacía el cargador de un revólver compacto y lo recarga.{/n}

languages.text: {n}もはや顔を覆う壊れたゴーグルはなく、毛のない頭蓋骨は恐ろしく成長して膨らんでいる。しかし、さらに恐ろしい部位によって、敵のミュータントの姿があっという間に露呈した。胴体から3本目の腕が生えているではないか。その指がリボルバーのドラムを器用に空にして、新しい弾丸を装填する様子を見つめていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No longer covered by the broken goggles, the hairless skull is bulging with massive growths. However, the mutant nature of your enemy is just as quickly betrayed by an even more unsettling feature: the third arm growing out of his torso. You watch as its fingers deftly empty the drum of a stub revolver and load it with fresh rounds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}もはや顔を覆う壊れたゴーグルはなく、毛のない頭蓋骨は恐ろしく成長して膨らんでいる。しかし、さらに恐ろしい部位によって、敵のミュータントの姿があっという間に露呈した。胴体から3本目の腕が生えているではないか。その指がリボルバーのドラムを器用に空にして、新しい弾丸を装填する様子を見つめていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}涅墨赛特脸上破碎的护目镜已经消失不见，没有毛发的头上长着巨大的赘生物。不仅如此，这个变种人的其他变异特征令人相当不安：他的躯干上长出了第三条手臂。此刻，他第三条手臂的手指灵巧地清空了短筒左轮手枪的转轮，装填好了新的子弹。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No longer covered by the broken goggles, the hairless skull is bulging with massive growths. However, the mutant nature of your enemy is just as quickly betrayed by an even more unsettling feature: the third arm growing out of his torso. You watch as its fingers deftly empty the drum of a stub revolver and load it with fresh rounds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}涅墨赛特脸上破碎的护目镜已经消失不见，没有毛发的头上长着巨大的赘生物。不仅如此，这个变种人的其他变异特征令人相当不安：他的躯干上长出了第三条手臂。此刻，他第三条手臂的手指灵巧地清空了短筒左轮手枪的转轮，装填好了新的子弹。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Débarrassé de ses lunettes brisées, le crâne chauve apparaît couvert d'énormes excroissances. Mais la nature mutante de votre ennemi est trahie tout aussi rapidement par une caractéristique plus troublante encore : un troisième bras émergeant de son torse. Vous observez ses doigts vider habilement le barillet d'un vieux revolver avant de le charger avec de nouvelles balles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No longer covered by the broken goggles, the hairless skull is bulging with massive growths. However, the mutant nature of your enemy is just as quickly betrayed by an even more unsettling feature: the third arm growing out of his torso. You watch as its fingers deftly empty the drum of a stub revolver and load it with fresh rounds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Débarrassé de ses lunettes brisées, le crâne chauve apparaît couvert d'énormes excroissances. Mais la nature mutante de votre ennemi est trahie tout aussi rapidement par une caractéristique plus troublante encore : un troisième bras émergeant de son torse. Vous observez ses doigts vider habilement le barillet d'un vieux revolver avant de le charger avec de nouvelles balles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Artık kırık gözlüğünün arkasına saklanmayan saçsız kalmış kafatası, devasa tümörlerle kaynıyor. Ancak düşmanının mutant tabiatı, aniden daha da rahatsız edici bir özelliğin gölgesinde kalıyor: Gövdesinden üçüncü bir kol çıkıyor. Parmaklarının bodur altıpatların kovanını ustaca boşaltıp yeni mermilerle dolduruşunu izliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No longer covered by the broken goggles, the hairless skull is bulging with massive growths. However, the mutant nature of your enemy is just as quickly betrayed by an even more unsettling feature: the third arm growing out of his torso. You watch as its fingers deftly empty the drum of a stub revolver and load it with fresh rounds.{/n}
